component.text: 1. <textformat blockindent='14'>Examines the Fa0/0 inbound ACL to determine if telnet requests are permitted to leave the network.</textformat>
2. <textformat blockindent='14'>IOS compares packet type to inspection rules to determine if telnet should be tracked.</textformat>
3. <textformat blockindent='14'>Adds information to the state type to track the telnet session.</textformat>
4. <textformat blockindent='14'>Adds a dynamic entry to the inbound ACL on S0/0/0 to allow reply packets back into the internal network.</textformat>
5. <textformat blockindent='14'>When the session is terminated by the client, the router will remove the state entry and dynamic ACL entry.</textformat>
